verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me again saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> there were two <S%H8147><s%> women, <S%H802><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> mother; <S%H517><s%>

and they played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> They played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in their youth; <S%H5271><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> their breasts <S%H7699><s%> were pressed, <S%H4600><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> their virgin <S%H1331><s%> bosom <S%H1717><s%> was handled. <S%H9439><s%>

"And their names <S%H8034><s%> were Oholah <S%H170><s%> the elder <S%H1419><s%> and Oholibah <S%H172><s%> her sister. <S%H269><s%> And they became <S%H1961><s%> Mine, and they bore <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%> And [as for] their names, <S%H8034><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> is Oholah, <S%H170><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is Oholibah. <S%H172><s%>

"And Oholah <S%H170><s%> played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> while <S%H8478><s%> she was Mine; <S%H8478><s%> and she lusted <S%H5689><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> her lovers, <S%H157><s%> after <S%H413><s%> the Assyrians, <S%H804><s%> [her] neighbors, <S%H7138><s%>

who were clothed <S%H3847><s%> in purple, <S%H8504><s%> governors <S%H6346><s%> and officials, <S%H5461><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men, <S%H970><s%> horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses. <S%H5483><s%>

"And she bestowed <S%H5414><s%> her harlotries <S%H8457><s%> on them, all <S%H3605><s%> of whom [were] the choicest <S%H4005><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> she lusted <S%H5689><s%> after, with all <S%H3605><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> she defiled <S%H2930><s%> herself.

"And she did not forsake <S%H5800><s%> her harlotries <S%H8457><s%> from [the time in] Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for in her youth <S%H5271><s%> men had lain <S%H7901><s%> with her, and they handled <S%H9439><s%> her virgin <S%H1331><s%> bosom <S%H1717><s%> and poured <S%H8210><s%> out their lust <S%H8457><s%> on her.

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> her into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her lovers, <S%H157><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> she lusted. <S%H5689><s%>

"They uncovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> they took <S%H3947><s%> her sons <S%H1121><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but they slew <S%H2026><s%> her with the sword. <S%H2719><s%> Thus she became <S%H1961><s%> a byword <S%H8034><s%> among women, <S%H802><s%> and they executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8196><s%> on her.

"Now her sister <S%H269><s%> Oholibah <S%H172><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [this,] yet she was more <S%H4480><s%> corrupt <S%H7843><s%> in her lust <S%H5691><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> she, and her harlotries <S%H8457><s%> were more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the harlotries <S%H2183><s%> of her sister. <S%H269><s%>

"She lusted <S%H5689><s%> after <S%H413><s%> the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> governors <S%H6346><s%> and officials, <S%H5461><s%> the ones <S%H7138><s%> near, <S%H7138><s%> magnificently <S%H4358><s%> dressed, <S%H3847><s%> horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men. <S%H970><s%>
"And I saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had defiled <S%H2930><s%> herself; they both <S%H8147><s%> took the same <S%H259><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>

"So she increased <S%H3254><s%> her harlotries. <S%H8457><s%> And she saw <S%H7200><s%> men <S%H376><s%> portrayed <S%H2707><s%> on the wall, <S%H7023><s%> images <S%H6754><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> portrayed <S%H2710><s%> with vermilion, <S%H8350><s%>

girded <S%H2289><s%> with belts <S%H232><s%> on their loins, <S%H4975><s%> with flowing <S%H5628><s%> turbans <S%H2871><s%> on their heads, <S%H7218><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them looking <S%H4758><s%> like officers, <S%H7991><s%> like <S%H1823><s%> the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> [in] Chaldea, <S%H3778><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of their birth. <S%H4138><s%>
"And when she saw <S%H4758><s%> <S%H5869><s%> them she lusted <S%H5689><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> them and sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to them in Chaldea. <S%H3778><s%>

"And the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to her to the bed <S%H4904><s%> of love, <S%H1730><s%> and they defiled <S%H2930><s%> her with their harlotry. <S%H8457><s%> And when she had been <S%H2930><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> by them, she became <S%H3363><s%> disgusted <S%H3363><s%> with them.

"And she uncovered <S%H1540><s%> her harlotries <S%H8457><s%> and uncovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> then I became <S%H3363><s%> disgusted <S%H3363><s%> with her, as I had become <S%H5361><s%> disgusted <S%H5361><s%> with her sister. <S%H269><s%>

"Yet she multiplied <S%H7235><s%> her harlotries, <S%H8457><s%> remembering <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of her youth, <S%H5271><s%> when <S%H834><s%> she played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"And she lusted <S%H5689><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> their paramours, <S%H6370><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is [like] the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of donkeys <S%H2543><s%> and whose issue <S%H2231><s%> is [like] the issue <S%H2231><s%> of horses. <S%H5483><s%>

"Thus you longed <S%H6485><s%> for the lewdness <S%H2154><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> when the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> handled <S%H9439><s%> your bosom <S%H1717><s%> because <S%H4616><s%> of the breasts <S%H7699><s%> of your youth. <S%H5271><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O Oholibah, <S%H172><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold <S%H2009><s%> I will arouse <S%H5782><s%> your lovers <S%H157><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, from whom <S%H834><s%> you were alienated, <S%H5361><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them against <S%H5921><s%> you from every <S%H5439><s%> side: <S%H5439><s%>

the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> Pekod <S%H6489><s%> and Shoa <S%H7772><s%> and Koa, <S%H6970><s%> [and] all <S%H3605><s%> the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> with them; desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men, <S%H970><s%> governors <S%H6346><s%> and officials <S%H5461><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them, officers <S%H7991><s%> and men <S%H7121><s%> of renown, <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses. <S%H5483><s%>

'And they will come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you with weapons, <S%H2021><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and wagons, <S%H1534><s%> and with a company <S%H6951><s%> of peoples. <S%H5971><s%> They will set <S%H7760><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> you on every <S%H5439><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> with buckler <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet; <S%H6959><s%> and I shall commit <S%H5414><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> to them, and they will judge <S%H8199><s%> you according to their customs. <S%H4941><s%>

'And I will set <S%H5414><s%> My jealousy <S%H7068><s%> against you, that they may deal <S%H6213><s%> with you in wrath. <S%H2534><s%> They will remove <S%H5493><s%> your nose <S%H639><s%> and your ears; <S%H241><s%> and your survivors <S%H319><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%> They will take <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and your survivors <S%H319><s%> will be consumed <S%H398><s%> by the fire. <S%H784><s%>
'They will also strip <S%H6584><s%> you of your clothes <S%H899><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> away your beautiful <S%H8597><s%> jewels. <S%H3627><s%>

'Thus I shall make your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your harlotry <S%H2184><s%> [brought] from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from you, so that you will not lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> to them or remember <S%H2142><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> anymore. <S%H5750><s%>'

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> you into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those whom <S%H834><s%> you hate, <S%H8130><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those from whom <S%H834><s%> you were alienated. <S%H5361><s%>

'And they will deal <S%H6213><s%> with you in hatred, <S%H8135><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your property, <S%H3018><s%> and leave <S%H5800><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare. <S%H6181><s%> And the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your harlotries <S%H2183><s%> shall be uncovered, <S%H1540><s%> both your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your harlotries. <S%H8457><s%>

'These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> will be done <S%H6213><s%> to you because you have played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with the nations, <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have defiled <S%H2930><s%> yourself with their idols. <S%H1544><s%>
'You have walked <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of your sister; <S%H269><s%> therefore I will give <S%H5414><s%> her cup <S%H3563><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>'

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'You will drink <S%H8354><s%> your sister's cup, <S%H3563><s%> Which is deep <S%H6013><s%> and wide. <S%H7342><s%> You will be laughed <S%H6712><s%> at and held in derision; <S%H3933><s%> It contains <S%H3557><s%> much. <S%H4767><s%>

'You will be filled <S%H4390><s%> with drunkenness <S%H7943><s%> and sorrow, <S%H3015><s%> The cup <S%H3563><s%> of horror <S%H8047><s%> and desolation, <S%H8077><s%> The cup <S%H3563><s%> of your sister <S%H269><s%> Samaria. <S%H8111><s%>

'And you will drink <S%H8354><s%> it and drain <S%H4680><s%> it. Then you will gnaw <S%H1633><s%> its fragments <S%H2789><s%> And tear <S%H5423><s%> your breasts; <S%H7699><s%> for I have spoken, <S%H1696><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Because <S%H3282><s%> you have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> Me and cast <S%H7993><s%> Me behind <S%H310><s%> your back, <S%H1458><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> now <S%H1571><s%> the [punishment] of your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your harlotries. <S%H8457><s%>'"

Moreover, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> will you judge <S%H8199><s%> Oholah <S%H170><s%> and Oholibah <S%H172><s%>? Then declare <S%H5046><s%> to them their abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

"For they have committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> is on their hands. <S%H3027><s%> Thus they have committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery <S%H5003><s%> with their idols <S%H1544><s%> and even <S%H1571><s%> caused their sons, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they bore <S%H3205><s%> to Me, to pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> [the fire] to them as food. <S%H402><s%>

"Again, <S%H5750><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> to Me: they have defiled <S%H2930><s%> My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> on the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> My sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

"For when they had slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%> for their idols, <S%H1544><s%> they entered <S%H935><s%> My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> on the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to profane <S%H2490><s%> it; and lo, <S%H2009><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> My house. <S%H1004><s%>

"Furthermore, <S%H637><s%> they have even <S%H3588><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> for men <S%H376><s%> who come <S%H935><s%> from afar, <S%H4801><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> was sent; <S%H7971><s%> and lo, <S%H2009><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> – for whom <S%H834><s%> you bathed, <S%H7364><s%> painted <S%H3583><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and decorated <S%H5710><s%> yourselves <S%H5710><s%> with ornaments; <S%H5716><s%>

and you sat <S%H3427><s%> on a splendid <S%H3519><s%> couch <S%H4296><s%> with a table <S%H7979><s%> arranged <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it, on which you had set <S%H7760><s%> My incense <S%H7004><s%> and My oil. <S%H8081><s%>

"And the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a carefree <S%H7961><s%> multitude <S%H1995><s%> was with her; and drunkards <S%H5433><s%> were brought <S%H935><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with men <S%H376><s%> of the common <S%H7230><s%> <S%H120><s%> sort. <S%H7230><s%> <S%H120><s%> And they put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the women and beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crowns <S%H5850><s%> on their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

"Then I said <S%H559><s%> concerning her who was worn <S%H1087><s%> out by adulteries, <S%H5004><s%> 'Will they now <S%H6258><s%> commit <S%H2181><s%> adultery <S%H2181><s%> with her when she is [thus]?'

"But they went <S%H935><s%> in to her as they would go <S%H935><s%> in to a harlot. <S%H2181><s%> Thus <S%H3651><s%> they went <S%H935><s%> in to Oholah <S%H170><s%> and to Oholibah, <S%H172><s%> the lewd <S%H2154><s%> women. <S%H802><s%>

"But they, righteous <S%H6662><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> will judge <S%H8199><s%> them with the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of adulteresses, <S%H5003><s%> and with the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of women who shed <S%H8210><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are adulteresses <S%H5003><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> is on their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Bring <S%H5927><s%> up a company <S%H6951><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, and give <S%H5414><s%> them over to terror <S%H2113><s%> and plunder. <S%H957><s%>

'And the company <S%H6951><s%> will stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%> and cut <S%H1254><s%> them down <S%H1254><s%> with their swords; <S%H2719><s%> they will slay <S%H2026><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

'Thus I shall make lewdness <S%H2154><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> from the land, <S%H776><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> women <S%H802><s%> may be admonished <S%H3256><s%> and not commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%> as you have done.

'And your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> will be requited <S%H5414><s%> upon you, and you will bear <S%H5375><s%> the penalty <S%H2399><s%> of [worshiping] your idols; <S%H1544><s%> thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>' "
